typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_AccountId} as long,
		{_CreationDate} as string,
		{_DisplayName} as string,
		{_DownVotes} as long,
		{_Id} as long,
		{_LastAccessDate} as string,
		{_Location} as string,
		{_ProfileImageUrl} as string,
		{_Reputation} as long,
		{_UpVotes} as long,
		{_Views} as long,
		{_WebsiteUrl} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> srcUser
source(output(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		Reputation as integer,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		DisplayName as string,
		LastAccessDate as timestamp,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		Location as string,
		UpVotes as integer,
		DownVotes as integer,
		ProfileImageUrl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimUser
Join split(DisplayName!={_DisplayName}
&&
{_Id}==DimUser@UserSk,
	DimUser@UserSk=={_Id} && {_Location} != Location,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(SCD1, SCD2, ELSE)
srcUser, DimUser join({_Id} == UserSk,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join
ConditionalSplit@SCD1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
ConditionalSplit@SCD2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
FilterActiveRows select(mapColumn(
		Existing_UserId = UserId,
		Existing_UserSk = UserSk,
		Existing_AccountId = AccountId,
		Existing_Reputation = Reputation,
		Existing_CreationDate = CreationDate,
		Existing_DisplayName = DisplayName,
		Existing_LastAccessDate = LastAccessDate,
		Existing_WebsiteUrl = WebsiteUrl,
		Existing_Location = Location,
		Existing_UpVotes = UpVotes,
		Existing_DownVotes = DownVotes,
		Existing_ProfileImageUrl = ProfileImageUrl
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExisting
DimUser filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> FilterActiveRows
AlterRow sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		Reputation as integer,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		DisplayName as string,
		LastAccessDate as timestamp,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		Location as string,
		UpVotes as integer,
		DownVotes as integer,
		ProfileImageUrl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['AccountId'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		AccountId = {_AccountId},
		Reputation = {_Reputation},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		DisplayName,
		LastAccessDate = {_LastAccessDate},
		WebsiteUrl = {_WebsiteUrl},
		UpVotes = {_UpVotes},
		DownVotes = {_DownVotes},
		ProfileImageUrl = {_ProfileImageUrl},
		UserSk = {_Id}
	)) ~> UpdateDestDimUser
AlterRowUpsert sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		Reputation as integer,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		DisplayName as string,
		LastAccessDate as timestamp,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		Location as string,
		UpVotes as integer,
		DownVotes as integer,
		ProfileImageUrl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['UserId'],
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = {_Id},
		Reputation = {_Reputation},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		LastAccessDate = {_LastAccessDate},
		WebsiteUrl = {_WebsiteUrl},
		Location = {_Location},
		UpVotes = {_UpVotes},
		DownVotes = {_DownVotes},
		ProfileImageUrl = {_ProfileImageUrl},
		AccountId = {_AccountId}
	)) ~> InsertDestDimUser
ConditionalSplit@ELSE sink(input(
		UserId as integer,
		UserSk as integer,
		AccountId as integer,
		Reputation as integer,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		DisplayName as string,
		LastAccessDate as timestamp,
		WebsiteUrl as string,
		Location as string,
		UpVotes as integer,
		DownVotes as integer,
		ProfileImageUrl as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		UserSk = {_Id},
		Reputation = {_Reputation},
		CreationDate = {_CreationDate},
		DisplayName = {_DisplayName},
		LastAccessDate = {_LastAccessDate},
		WebsiteUrl = {_WebsiteUrl},
		Location = {_Location},
		UpVotes = {_UpVotes},
		DownVotes = {_DownVotes},
		ProfileImageUrl = {_ProfileImageUrl},
		AccountId = {_AccountId}
	)) ~> dstUser
